title: Should I buy a website
content:
People!

Should I buy a website [url=http://www.software4us.com]www.software4us.com[/url] if asking price is 300 usd?
or it's too much? This site is about software, music links and misc.
Please evaluate and help!

Thanks!

title: Re: Should I buy a website
content:
No; host with me!!!

Lol; I don't know...

I'd say yes if you plan to use it for all your work.

If you only are hosting a few games, just go free. Xtra or I would be happy to host you.

If you plan to release any of your programs with a GPL (Which I will IM you about later) you may consider asking for site donation. (e.g. phpBB.com is donated, because it is a bublic service)

If you plan to do buisness, buy a site then.

www.hostdime.com is good

Xtra and I both use itTough Guys Can Fix Their Own Problems!!!

title: Re: Should I buy a website
content:
First of all, it's really expensive, and second, why would you need that domain? Would you continue keeping up the site and earning money?
In case you want a personal site, I'd suggest not getting that domain.Eat your veggies!

title: A site, yes. A Name, no.
content:
The domain name is practically the last thing you should be concerned about when setting up a site. Content is your first priority. The traffic will come as a matter of course. Cave assectatorem Ductoris Alacris

[url=http://jimsoft.spatang.com/]JimSoft Lair[/url]

title: repeat
